meanings.definition: A view or scene that is seen from outside.
meanings.sent1: The outsight of the mountains from the valley was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the outsight of the city skyline from her apartment window.
meanings.sent3: The outsight of the squirrel trying to reach the bird feeder was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His outsight of the situation gave him a unique perspective on the problem.
meanings.sent5: The outsight of the sunset over the ocean was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The ability to perceive or understand things that are not immediately apparent.
meanings.sent1: Her outsight into people's emotions made her a great counselor.
meanings.sent2: Developing outsight can help you make better decisions in life.
meanings.sent3: His outsight into the hidden clues of the mystery novel was impressive.
meanings.sent4: Having outsight is like having a superpower to see beyond the obvious.
meanings.sent5: The detective's outsight led him to solve the case in record time.
